span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 做出反应： to act or behave in response (as to a stimulus or influence)
【例】 didn't know how to react to the cheers of the crowd 不知如何对人群的欢呼声做出回应
【近】 answer, reply, respond
【派】 reaction n. 反应；reactant n. （化学反应当中的）反应物
